overview:
## Discussion

Set this configuration value to cause a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchRequest] to execute a fetch with a new collection of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] instances. If you want to use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] instances, set [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchRequest/Configuration/sortDescriptors] instead. Use care to coordinate section and sort updates, as described in [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchRequest/Configuration].

Access this value for a given request by using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchResults/nsSortDescriptors] property on the associated [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchResults] instance, either directly or with a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Binding].

# nsSortDescriptors

**Instance Property**

The request’s sort descriptors, accessed as reference types.

## Declaration

```swift
var nsSortDescriptors: [NSSortDescriptor]
```

## Discussion

Set this configuration value to cause a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchRequest] to execute a fetch with a new collection of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] instances. If you want to use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] instances, set [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchRequest/Configuration/sortDescriptors] instead. Use care to coordinate section and sort updates, as described in [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchRequest/Configuration].

Access this value for a given request by using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchResults/nsSortDescriptors] property on the associated [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SectionedFetchResults] instance, either directly or with a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Binding].

## Setting sort descriptors

- **sortDescriptors**: The request’s sort descriptors, accessed as value types.
